alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 2:06AM MST until January 19 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in the valleys and 4 to 8 inches in mountains above 6000 feet MSL. * WHERE...Eastern Magic Valley, South Hills, and Albion Mountains including but not limited to Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Oakley, Albion, and Almo. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
